All Collections For Hosts Listing Costs

What are the costs of listing my place on your site?

Great news: listing on Split Lease is completely free. There are no upfront costs, monthly fees, or hidden charges. You only pay a small service fee when you actually receive bookings.

Zero Upfront Costs

$0 to create your listing. $0 monthly fees. You only pay when you earn.

Complete Cost Breakdown

To List Your Property: $0

  • Account creation: Free
  • Listing creation: Free
  • Photos and description: Free
  • Calendar management: Free
  • Guest messaging: Free
  • Profile unlimited listings: Free

While Your Listing is Active: $0

  • No monthly subscription
  • No listing fees
  • No marketing fees
  • No maintenance charges

When You Receive Bookings: Service Fee

Only pay when you earn:

  • Typically 10-15% of booking value
  • Deducted automatically from payout
  • Covers payment processing, customer support, platform maintenance
  • Much lower than Airbnb (20-25% total fees)

Comparison to Other Platforms

Platform Upfront Cost Monthly Fee Per-Booking Fee
Split Lease $0 $0 10-15%
Airbnb $0 $0 15-20% (+ guest fees)
Traditional Rental $0-2,500 broker $0 0%

Optional Costs You Might Have

Photography (Optional but Recommended)

  • DIY with smartphone: $0
  • Professional photos: $100-300 one-time
  • ROI: Professional photos increase bookings 40%

Cleaning Between Guests (Optional)

  • Self-clean: $0
  • Cleaning service: $50-150 per turnover
  • Pass cost to guest: Include in pricing or as separate fee

Amenities & Supplies (Optional)

  • Basic toiletries: $20-50/month
  • Coffee, snacks: $30-60/month
  • Extra linens: $100-200 one-time
  • Note: Not required, but improves reviews

What You Keep

Example Earning:

  • Guest pays: $1,200/month
  • Split Lease fee (12%): -$144
  • You receive: $1,056

85-90% of booking value goes directly to you.

No Hidden Fees

Unlike some platforms, Split Lease never charges:

  • ‚ùå Listing activation fees
  • ‚ùå Annual membership dues
  • ‚ùå Premium placement costs
  • ‚ùå Featured listing upgrades
  • ‚ùå Customer support fees
  • ‚ùå Payment processing markup
  • ‚ùå Cancellation fees (passed to guests)

How Payouts Work

Simple and transparent:

  • Guest pays Split Lease
  • Platform deducts service fee
  • Remaining amount transferred to you
  • Automatic monthly payouts
  • Direct deposit to your bank account

Tax Implications

Potential tax benefits:

  • Rental income from periodic tenancy may be tax-advantaged
  • Different treatment than short-term rentals
  • Consult tax professional for your situation
  • Learn more about tax benefits

ROI Example

Brooklyn 1BR, hosting Mon-Wed nights:

  • Monthly earnings: 12 nights √ó $90 = $1,080
  • Service fee (12%): -$130
  • Cleaning (self): $0
  • Supplies: -$30
  • Net monthly profit: $920
  • Annual profit: $11,040

Total investment to start: $0-300 for photos

Why Split Lease Costs Less

We Focus on Long-Term Guests

  • Less turnover = lower operational costs
  • Fewer customer service issues
  • Predictable revenue for both parties
  • Savings passed to hosts and guests

Efficient Platform

  • Automated payments and scheduling
  • Lower marketing costs (targeted audience)
  • Streamlined operations
  • No expensive TV advertising

Summary

Bottom Line

Zero cost to list. Zero cost to maintain. Only pay 10-15% when you earn money. It's completely risk-free to try.

Ready to start earning? Create your free listing today!
